p: Wild birds are the main reservoir for transmission of EEEV. Humans, horses, and other animals (domestic fowl, feral pigs, cattle and rodents) are not significant reservoir hosts (Zacks and Paessler 2010). Amphibians and reptiles are a possible reservoir for the virus to overwinter. Mosquitoes and infected eggs are also a reservoir for the viruses (Pfeffer and Dobler 2010).
